`rangeo` - random WKT or GeoJSON

## Install

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ropensci/randgeo")
```

```{r}
library("randgeo")
```

## random GeoJSON

position

```{r}
rg_position()
```

point

```{r}
rg_point()
```

polygon

```{r}
rg_polygon()
```
